Ball - Class in com.hfych2.brickdestroy.model
This class is the super class for RubberBall.
This class will be the super class for all ball objects which may be extended in the future.
This class defines the general behaviour of all ball objects.

Class constructor.
Calls the Ball.makeBall(Point2D, int, int) and assigns to Ball.ballFace.
Initialises the speed values, Ball.speedX and Ball.speedY to a value of zero.
Sets the initial location for Ball.up, Ball.down, Ball.left and Ball.right.
